All.Comments: Convert door 191's activation if key item rando is enabled.
Undo flipmap 0 triggers at the start of the level as it can break later areas.
It's entirely possible to softlock in OG in the main chamber area, so prevent that by adding extra triggers for trapdoors 79 and 145.
Create a return path from the top of the waterfall to the very beginning.
Add some music for the climb.

Any.Comments: Drop room 81 spike walls lower to increase difficulty.
Drop room 81 spike walls lower to increase difficulty.
Drop room 81 spike walls lower to increase difficulty.
Drop room 81 spike walls lower to increase difficulty.
Drop room 81 spike walls lower to increase difficulty.
Drop room 81 spike walls lower to increase difficulty.
Remove the exit ladder from room 23.
Move it to the front facing side instead.
Flatten the slope near the bridge in room 8, and raise the ceiling too.
Move the trigger for springboard 13 to the flattened slope.
Add the dummy static to block the bridge.
Adjust some faces to match the geometry change (but retain the fake slope appearance).
Put a ladder where the springboard used to be.

Leader.Comments: Ensure there is a large medi in the unreachable room.
And that it's in its vanilla position.

Followers.Comments: Scenario 1 - make the fake ladder real and the medi reachable.
Play some revelation music.
A glitched secret may be in the unreachable room, so move it to another glitched location.
Scenario 2 - make the fake ladder real but remove the medi.
Move the medi elsewhere.
Play some sad music.
A glitched secret may be in the unreachable room, so move it to another glitched location.
Scenario 3.1 - keep the fake ladder and move the medi.
Scenario 3.2 - keep the fake ladder and move the medi.
Scenario 3.3 - keep the fake ladder and move the medi.
Scenario 3.4 - keep the fake ladder and move the medi.
Scenario 4 - vanilla.

Condition.Comments: Potentially move spike walls, as long as there isn't a particular secret present.
